page.title: 12Farming, Farm survey
page.content:
{Dowthorpe Farm}is an arable farm of roughly 1000 acres.It produces{ {wheat, barley, corn, oil seed rape, {peas, and beans }on a seven year rotation which is two years{wheat,}one year{peas}and{beans,}two years{wheat,} one year{barley,}one year{rape.} { } {Crop Yield (tons Sale Price Area { per acre) (per acre) (acres) Wheat 3.5 Â£105 560 Barley 3.5 Â£100 140 O.S. Rape 1.5 Â£275 140 Peas/Beans 1.5 Â£180 140
The present farm was originally three farms and part of one of them has a section where you may pick your own soft fruit and vegetables. Seven people work on the farm using much machinery. Extra workers are employed during the harvest.
